name: Kayle
title: the Righteous
lore: Born to a Targonian Aspect at the height of the Rune Wars, Kayle honored her mother's legacy by fighting for justice on wings of divine flame. She and her twin sister Morgana were the protectors of Demacia for many years—until Kayle became disillusioned with the repeated failings of mortals, and abandoned this realm altogether. Still, legends are told of her punishing the unjust with her fiery swords, and many hope that she will one day return…
blurb: Born to a Targonian Aspect at the height of the Rune Wars, Kayle honored her mother's legacy by fighting for justice on wings of divine flame. She and her twin sister Morgana were the protectors of Demacia for many years—until Kayle became disillusioned...
allytips: Using Divine Judgment on a high-DPS ally can turn the tides of battle by giving your ally free reign to attack.
Kayle's attacks become incredibly powerful once she gains attack range from Divine Ascent. Play safe until then.
Kayle benefits greatly from Attack Damage and Ability Power, making hybrid items like Nashor's Tooth and Hextech Gunblade very effective on her.
enemytips: Divine Judgment only grants Kayle or her allies immunity to damage. Slows and stuns can still be applied, so trap them if they're being overzealous.
Kayle is usually a fragile target. If you see her ultimate cast on an ally, switch to attacking her.
Kayle starts the game as a weaker melee champion. Try to put her behind before she ascends to her ranged form.

riot_spell_q.name: Radiant Blast
riot_spell_q.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Kayle summons a celestial sword that stops on the first enemy hit.

The sword deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the target and enemies behind it, slows by {{ slowpercent }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds, and shreds Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ shredpercent }}% for {{ shredduration }} seconds.

riot_spell_w.name: Celestial Blessing
riot_spell_w.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants movement speed to herself and the nearest ally.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Kayle and target allied champion are healed for <healing>{{ totalheal }} health</healing> and gain {{ totalhaste }} Movement Speed for {{ hasteduration }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Starfire Spellblade
riot_spell_e.description:
Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Passive: Attacks deal {{ epassivetotaldamage }} bonus magic damage.

Active: Kayle's next attack becomes ranged and deals {{ activetotalexecutedamage }} of the target's missing health as bonus magic damage. This attack upgrades when Kayle reaches Level {{ spell.kaylepassive:levelforpassiverank1 }}, causing it to explode when it hits the target, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

riot_spell_r.name: Divine Judgment
riot_spell_r.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Kayle makes an allied champion invulnerable for {{ invulnduration }} seconds.

Then, after a cast time, she purifies the area around them dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies.

riot_spell_i.name: Divine Ascent
riot_spell_i.description: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Movement Speed towards enemies, waves of fire on her attacks, Attack Range, and True Damage.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Divine Ascent
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon reaching levels 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending another skill point, '''Kayle''' ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Zealous (1):}} '''Kayle's''' basic attacks against non-structures grant {{sti|as|{{as|6% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, '''Kayle''' becomes {{as|Exalted|buzzword2}}, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|15% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving toward enemies.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: {{sbc|Aflame (6):}} While {{as|Exalted|buzzword2}}, '''Kayle's''' basic attacks against non-structures additionally launch a wave of fire in the target's direction, dealing {{pp|type=[[File:Starfire Spellblade.png|20px|link=]] Starfire Spellblade's Rank|6|10;10 to 30|0 to 5}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies hit. The waves can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description4: {{sbc|Arisen (11):}} '''Kayle''' becomes a {{tip|ranged|ranged champion}} with {{sti|range|550 attack range}}. Additionally, ''Zealous's'' '''bonus''' attack speed is increased to {{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}} per stack, for a maximum of {{as|50% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description5: {{sbc|Transcendent (16):}} ''Zealous'' is permanently set to maximum stacks. Additionally, ''Aflame's'' fiery waves now deal {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} instead.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* If '''Kayle''' is in her attack animation after the stacks finish she gains another {{fd|0.5}} seconds to refresh / stack ''Zealous''.
* The waves apply [[spell effects]].
* The waves and passive stacks do not benefit from {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} or {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.
* The on-hit effect and Exalted buff refresh when attacking turrets.
* While in melee range she will attack with her sword, bypassing {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
** This will not negate the activation of ranged effects (i.e {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}).
* Upon becoming ''Arisen'', '''Kayle's''' portrait changes:
** On the original skin [[File:Kayle OriginalCircle.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle OriginalCircle Arisen.png|30px]].
** On the Silver skin [[File:Kayle SilverCircle.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle SilverCircle Arisen.png|30px]].
** On the Viridian skin [[File:Kayle ViridianCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle ViridianCircle.png|30px]].
** On the Battleborn skin [[File:Kayle BattlebornCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle BattlebornCircle.png|30px]].
** On the Aether Wing skin [[File:Kayle AetherWingCircle.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle AetherWingCircle Arisen.png|30px]].
** On the Riot skin [[File:Kayle RiotCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle RiotCircle.png|30px]].
** On the Pentakill skin [[File:Kayle PentakillCircle PreArisen.png|30px]] becomes [[File:Kayle PentakillCircle.png|30px]].
** {{csl|Kayle|Transcended}}, {{csl|Kayle|Judgment}}, and {{csl|Kayle|Iron Inquisitor}} do not change portrait.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Radiant Blast
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' plants a portal at her initial location that faces the target direction. After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from the portal.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: The sword explodes into a cross upon collision with an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|Slow|slowing}} targets struck, while reducing their {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} by 20% for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* The VFX of the cross that spreads upon hitting its initial target shows the blade and guard of a sword.
** Despite the VFX suggesting otherwise, the two sides of the guard are each as long as the blade in terms of collision: approximately 295 units. {{pending for test}}

wikia_skill_w1.name: Celestial Blessing
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' and target allied champion are {{tip|heal|healed}} and gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Heal|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|24 to 40}}% {{as|(+ 8% per 100 AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: If cast without a valid target, or self-cast, ''Celestial Blessing'' will automatically target the closest ally in range, prioritizing the most wounded one.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* The ability's effects apply instantly but '''Kayle''' will remain in {{ct|cast|cast time|move=true}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
* The ability will also try to auto-target [[decoy|decoys]] if they're in range. However, by default, decoys cannot be targeted by allies. This will cause the side-effect of '''Kayle''' not being able to cast ''Celestial Blessing'' if there's only a decoy nearby, even if she casts it on herself.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Starfire Spellblade
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kayle's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. Additionally, {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame's}} base damage is increased.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle's''' next basic attack within 6 seconds deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. After unlocking {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame}}, the attack explodes, damaging and applying [[on-hit]] effects to all enemies around the target.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling2: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|8 to 16}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''missing''' health}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description3: Prior to becoming {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, ''Starfire Spellblade'' also causes '''Kayle''' to become a {{tip|ranged|ranged champion}} with 550 attack range on the empowered attack.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Starfire Spellblade's'' active applies both on-hit and spell effects.
* Before becoming {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, when attacking below 175 range, ''Starfire Spellblade's'' active is considered a {{tip|melee}} attack (i.e. it will trigger {{ii|Tiamat}}).
** After unlocking ''Aflame'', the exploding attack will only trigger the {{ii|Tiamat|Cleave and Crescent}} passives on the primary target, unlike all other on-hit effects.
* '''Kayle's''' target essentially takes double damage from her innate if they do not avoid the fiery wave, as the on-hit damage and wave damage will stack.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Divine Judgement
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' refreshes {{ai|Zealous|Kayle}} and grants the target allied champion or herself {{tip|invulnerability}} for a few seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: '''Kayle''' also begins {{ct|cast|conjuring|move=true|items=false,true|spells=true,true,false,false,false|interrupts=false}} swords around herself and highlights an area around her target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. At the end of the channel, the swords rain down and deal {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area around her target.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: ''Divine Judgement'' will prioritize casting on allies over '''Kayle'''.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* The aura around the target is not visible if the target is not {{tip|sight|visible}}.
* The mana expenditure only occurs after the cast time, though '''Kayle''' requires at least 100 mana to begin the cast.
** The ability will still go off if '''Kayle''' has less than the required mana at the time of expenditure (for effects like {{iis|Seraph's Embrace}}).
* Once cast has begun, the second part of the ability will go off whether or not '''Kayle''' or her target are alive.
* The prioritization will also cause ''Divine Judgement'' to be able to target allied [[decoy|decoys]], which are otherwise {{tip|untargetable}} by allies.
* The ending of other ''invulnerability'' effects (i.e {{cai|Lamb's Respite|Kindred}}) will cause ''Divine Judgement'''s  invulnerability to shortly have no effect.
